description.short: Coachello’s AI Copilot is your professional development assistant. It enables you to book coaching sessions, conduct AI coaching sessions and role play situations at work.
description.full:
Coachello’s AI Copilot is a groundbreaking tool designed to revolutionize the coaching experience by combining advanced AI and human coaching capabilities.

With AI Copilot, users can effortlessly book coaching sessions with world-class professionals or explore the power of AI-driven coaching sessions for personalized guidance and support. This innovative feature also allows you to role-play workplace scenarios, helping you prepare for challenging conversations, presentations, and decision-making situations. Whether you seek human connection or cutting-edge AI coaching support, Coachello’s AI Copilot provides a versatile and transformative coaching solution tailored to your needs.
